topics.name: Agent 安全
topics.github_query: topic:agent-security OR topic:llm-security OR topic:ai-safety stars:>50
topics.description: LLM/Agent 安全防护、红队测试、漏洞研究

topics.name: 代码大模型
topics.github_query: topic:code-generation OR topic:code-llm OR topic:codegen stars:>100
topics.description: 代码生成模型、基座能力、评测基准

topics.name: Code Agent
topics.github_query: topic:code-agent OR topic:coding-agent OR topic:swe-agent stars:>50
topics.description: 自主编程 Agent、多 Agent 协作、SWE-bench

topics.name: MCP 生态
topics.github_query: topic:mcp OR topic:model-context-protocol OR topic:function-calling stars:>30
topics.description: Model Context Protocol、工具调用、Agent 集成

topics.name: AI 开发工具
topics.github_query: topic:ai-coding OR topic:code-assistant OR topic:copilot-alternative stars:>100
topics.description: AI 编程助手、IDE 插件、开发体验
